data.title: Bachelor's in Information Systems
data.details: Currently pursuing a bachelor's in Information Technology/Information Systems, gaining knowledge in software development, databases, networks, and software engineering.

data.title: Technical High School in Computer Science
data.details: Technical course in computer science focused on hardware, software, and networking fundamentals.

data.title: Flutter study
data.details: I am studying Flutter to improve my skills in mobile app development, exploring its capabilities and applicability in real-world projects.

data.title: .NET exploration
data.description: Learning back-end and expanding full-stack skills
data.details: I am exploring .NET to better understand back-end development and expand my full-stack skills, focusing on creating APIs and robust services.

data.title: React projects
data.details: I have developed projects in React to deepen my knowledge of the library, and I continue to improve my skills in state management, components, and routing.

data.title: Project with Vue.js
data.details: I am currently working on a project with Vue.js to enhance my experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and their integration with APIs.

data.title: Java projects
data.details: I have small projects in Java, exploring the language and its applicability, especially in back-end systems and database integration.

data.title: Interest in technology and innovation
data.description: Developing personal projects and seeking innovation
data.details: I have a strong interest in developing personal projects to test new technologies and constantly strive to improve my skills in various areas of technology.

data.title: Working in agile teams
data.details: I am interested in working in agile teams (Scrum, Kanban) to contribute to collaborative and innovative environments, prioritizing continuous delivery and constant improvement.
